attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. Be "AMAZED" with this 2021 Honda Amaze 1.2 Comfort now! It has less than 45 000 km's on the clock and it is in an excellent condition as it is fairly new. The ride quality of this sedan is "AMAZE-ING" and the steering ratio is perfect.. It can be used for business purposes to transport passengers but it is also a great family vehicle.
Manufacturers' claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 5.6 per 100 km. 
The seats are quite comfortable and ensures that you get a pleasurable driving experience in this sedan. 

ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES.

*ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED
